mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAME_GROUP (ANO, GROUPID, GID, TURN) VALUES (#{ano},#{groupId},#{gId},#{turn})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GAME_GROUP WHERE ANO=#{ano} AND GID=#{gId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GAME_GROUP WHERE ANO=#{ano} AND GID=#{gId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GAME_GROUP WHERE GID=#{gId} AND GROUPID=#{groupId}
SELECT * FROM GAME_GROUP WHERE GROUPID=#{groupId} AND TURN=#{turn} AND GID=#{gId}
